name: The Legend of Heroes: Ao no Kiseki
summary: Ao no Kiseki (also known as "Trails to Azure") serves as the fifth installment in the story of Zemuria, serving as a direct sequel to the events of the Zero no Kiseki/Trails from Zero. The Special Support Section is back with more members and more cases to solve! How will this rag-tag group deal with the oncoming threats to Crossbell's political stability while maintaining their team's foundation?
